trans-unit.source: This is a place holder for all the attributes related to the issued token
trans-unit.target: 这是所有属性的占位符与该发布标记相关

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified authentication claims to the subject of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的身份验证声明到当前实例的主题。

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies the authentication method.
trans-unit.target: 一个认证方法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Adds a claim for the specified authentication method to the subject of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的身份验证方法的一个声明到当前实例的主题。

trans-unit.source: The authentication instant is set to the current time.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证时刻设置为当前时间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod> and a value of `authType` and a <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant> and a value of <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> are added to the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A> property..
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>声明类型为<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod>和的值`authType`和<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>声明类型为<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant>和的值<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>添加到<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>指定的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A>属性...

trans-unit.source: A URI that specifies the authentication method.
trans-unit.target: 一个认证方法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The authentication instant in UTC.
trans-unit.target: UTC 中的身份验证时刻。

trans-unit.source: If the time is not in UTC, it is converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间不是 UTC 时间，则将其转换为 UTC 时间。

trans-unit.source: Adds claims for the specified authentication type and authentication instant to the subject of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的身份验证类型和身份验证时刻的声明到当前实例的主题。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod> and a value of `authType` and a <xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim> with a claim type of <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant> and a value of `time` are added to the <xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity> specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>声明类型为<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod>和的值`authType`和<xref:System.Security.Claims.Claim>声明类型为<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant>和的值`time`添加到<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity>指定的<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor.Subject%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the address for the AppliesTo property in the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" /> 中 AppliesTo 属性的地址。

trans-unit.source: An absolute URI that represents the address.
trans-unit.target: 表示该地址的绝对 URI。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set the property to a value that is not an absolute URI occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置一个值的属性，该值不是绝对的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The RSTR to which to apply the settings of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 应用当前实例的设置到的 RSTR。

trans-unit.source: Sets the appropriate properties of the specified RSTR based on the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 基于当前事例的属性设置指定 RSTR 的相应属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="response" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="response" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key identifier clause when the token is attached to the message
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当令牌附加到消息时的键标识符子句

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authentication information for the token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标记的身份验证信息。

trans-unit.source: The authentication information for the token.
trans-unit.target: 令牌的身份验证信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials that are used to encrypt the token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于加密令牌的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The credentials that are used to encrypt the token.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些凭据加密令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime information for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的生命周期信息。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime information for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 已颁发令牌的生存期信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proof descriptor for the issued token, which can be used to modify some fields inside the RSTR, such as requested proof token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的证明修饰器，其可用于修改 RSTR 内的一些字段，如请求的证明令牌。

trans-unit.source: The proof descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 证明说明符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties bag for the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 获取颁发的令牌的属性包。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary that represents the properties bag.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性包的字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the address for the ReplyToAddress property in the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse" /> 中 ReplyToAddress 属性的地址。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the address.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示地址的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the credentials that are used to sign the token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于对令牌进行签名的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The credentials that are used to sign the token.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些凭据签署令牌。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the output claims to be included in the issued token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已颁发令牌中包含的输入声明。

trans-unit.source: The claims identity that contains the output claims.
trans-unit.target: 包含输出声明的声明标识。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已颁发的安全性标记。

trans-unit.source: The issued security token.
trans-unit.target: 已颁发令牌的安全性标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the issuer name, which may be used inside the issued token also.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置颁发者名称，其可能还在已颁发令牌中使用。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 发行人名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the token type of the issued token
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已颁发令牌的令牌类型。

trans-unit.source: The token type.
trans-unit.target: 令牌类型。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause when the issued token is not attached to the message.
trans-unit.target: 当消息中没有颁发的令牌时的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 密钥标识符子句。
